mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, WDATE, REGDATE FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY SUBSTR(WDATE, 1, 8) ORDER BY WDATE ASC) RN, SEQ, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, WDATE, REGDATE FROM SISTCALENDAR WHERE ID=#{id} AND SUBSTR(WDATE, 1, 6)=#{wdate} ) WHERE RN BETWEEN 1 AND 5

SELECT SEQ, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, SUBSTR(WDATE, 1, 4)||'년'||SUBSTR(WDATE, 5, 2)||'월'||SUBSTR(WDATE, 7, 2)||'일' ||SUBSTR(WDATE, 9, 2)||'시'||SUBSTR(WDATE, 11, 2)||'분' WDATE, REGDATE FROM SISTCALENDAR WHERE ID=#{id} AND SUBSTR(WDATE, 1, 8)=#{wdate} ORDER BY WDATE ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SISTCALENDAR (SEQ, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, WDATE, REGDATE) VALUES(SEQ_SIST_CALENDAR.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{wdate}, SYSDATE)
